## git hooks readme

Manages the Githooks README in the current repository.

### Synopsis

Adds or updates the Githooks README in the `.githooks` folder.
This command needs to be run inside a repository.

```
git hooks readme
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for readme
```
